short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accelerate growth of petitions by getting notified when new ones are created.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of navigating to the Change.org website to search for and sign worthy petitions, get notified when new ones are created and sign with just two clicks. By bringing petitions to Change.org users in their natural web browsing environment, fledgling campaigns may gain traction and reach victory more quickly. Full disclaimer: this is a third party extension that is not affiliated with Change.org in any way.
